item.description:
This month will include a presentation by Kevin Driscoll, who wants to talk about the PC2ME Plus remote connectivity solution for iPhones. Kevin's description:

"Our innovative data compression refreshes your iPhone display 5 to 7 times a second from your desktop, even over Edge, resulting in faster connections and better performance and, for our many international users, we have added support for International Keyboard Character Sets for compatibility, convenience and efficiency.

User comments claim that PC2Me Plus Audio is the fastest, most efficient remote control option for the iPhone."

Complete details at PC2MEPlus.com

If time permits, we can also follow-up on any interesting projects that attendees are working on or planning.
item.how_to_find_us: Large meeting room on lower level
item.name: PC2MEPlus remote iPhone connectivity
